products.title: Sahara PVC Blackout Chiffon Cream Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Sahara PVC Blackout Chiffon Cream Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £10.36 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roller blind is made by our expert team, in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with a FREE five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2154 Fabric Colour: Chiffon Cream Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Pattern Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Sahara PVC Blackout Ivory 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Sahara PVC Blackout Ivory 89mm Vertical Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £16.15 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Sahara PVC blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments.This hard-wearing cream PVC vertical blind is ideal for areas where it is exposed to heat or wet as it is flame retardent and waterproof! 
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1341 Fabric Colour: Chiffon Cream Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Pattern Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Sahara Cream (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Sahara Cream (Moisture Resistant) Bathroom Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Bathroom Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Fabric Composition: PVC
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Sahara PVC Blackout Ivory Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Sahara PVC Blackout Ivory Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £145.44 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Sahara PVC blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments. 
 
This hard-wearing cream PVC roller blind is ideal for areas where it is exposed to heat or wet as it is flame retardent and waterproof. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2149 Fabric Colour: Chiffon Cream Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Pattern Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
